This could involve integrating apprenticeships or on-the-job training into the curriculum, allowing students to gain hands-on experience in their chosen field.

Furthermore, I think that the education system should focus more on developing skills that are directly applicable to the workforce, rather than solely emphasizing theoretical knowledge.
